songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Ugh!

[Hook: Sunny]
Feet in the water
Feels safe so let it go
Throw on a record
Feels good so let it flow

[Verse 1: DRAM]
When my feet hit the H20
I might say that it's way too cold to dive in
I'm striving I swear
But I'd rather you float me in
Come and go with me
You got a show to see
And I'm singing
Come and talk to me
CC Jodeci
A little Marco Polo ain't hurt nobody
Eyes closed, you gotta listen to find me
When you get what I'm spitting you get me
A+ for the written assignment
Footprints in the water at our secret little swimming pool
Waving like a pro cause I've been learning since like middle school

[Hook: Sunny]
Feet in the water
Feels safe so let it go
I got the kindle
I know where we can go
Feels good so let it flow
Throw on a record
Feels good so let it flow

[Verse 2: DRAM]
I want my feet up in the water
Telling me to let it go
I wonder who you're swimming with when I'm not around
Can (?) calm it down
I'm all up in this water
You telling me to dive in
I wonder what it is about myself that gets you wet
I wonder if it wasn't (?) swims

[Bridge: Sunny]
You know, I know
We know we won't let it go
I know, I know
You won't say no
We know, I know
You know we can't let it go
I know, I know
You can't say no

[Pre-Hook: DRAM]
(?)

[Hook: Sunny]
Feet in the water
Feels safe so let it go
I got the kindle
I know where we can go
Feels good so let it go
Throw on a record
Feels good so let it flow

[Outro: DRAM]
This amazing since babies
Wondering if I just left
Daisys I was chasing
My (?) with you, oh
The perfect
Cause don't know that you've got
The truth, right now
You know you bad
You know I want it bad
You know that I'm (?), yeah
songs.title: Feet In The Water
